django-uni-form (Django Uni-Form)¶

Django forms are easily rendered as tables, paragraphs, and unordered lists. However, elegantly rendered div based forms are something you have to do by hand. The purpose of this application is to provide a simple tag and/or filter that lets you quickly render forms in a div format.

Uni-form has been selected as the base model for the design of the forms.

Django Uni-Form lets you easily display Django forms as divs.
